title: When God Changes a Husband's Heart
itunes:author: Guest: Jeff Scruggs
itunes:summary:
Even when things seem difficult in your marriage, it's never too late for God to do a miracle. John and Greg discuss how seeking the Lord can make a big difference in your relationship. Featuring Jeff Scruggs.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "I Do Again" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-08?refcd=1411201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/when-god-changes-a-husbands-heart/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/hope-for-every-marriage-digital-product/?refcd=1411201

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
